entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
